title: Forcing churches to marry gays?
body:
http://endtimeheadlines.org/days-of-lot/idaho-citys-ordinance-tells-pastors-marry-gays-go-jail/

Look even if you want gays to be able to marry, you must agree that you cannot force a religious church to go against there faith and marry gays. They can get married elsewere, who is the government to decide how someone runs a church?

This is a violation of the constitution and should be thrown out soon.
